explains: v. 欢迎，迎接；对……作出反应；映入眼帘，扑鼻而来；<苏格兰>痛哭，哭泣
wordGroup: greet something with something 对某事作出某种反应

sentences.en: She floated down the steps to greet us.
sentences.cn: 她轻盈地下楼来迎接我们。

sentences.en: He bounced across the room to greet them.
sentences.cn: 他兴奋地冲过房间去迎接他们。

sentences.en: He rushed to greet her, sweeping his arms wide.
sentences.cn: 他张开双臂舞动着，冲过去迎接她。
